languages.text: "Великолепно..." {n}В голосе Маражая, обычно в такой ситуации звенящем от возбуждения, сквозит нечто новое — преисполненность, абсолютное довольство. Друкари разглядывает вас с едва читающимся спокойным восхищением в глазах.{/n} "Ни одно пиршество, устроенное нами на этом корабле, не было таким... совершенным. Я вспоминаю свои лучшие рейды... и память о них, кажется, меркнет в сравнении с тем, что происходит, когда мы делим это упоение друг с другом".

"Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."
languages.original_text: "Великолепно..." {n}В голосе Маражая, обычно в такой ситуации звенящем от возбуждения, сквозит нечто новое — преисполненность, абсолютное довольство. Друкари разглядывает вас с едва читающимся спокойным восхищением в глазах.{/n} "Ни одно пиршество, устроенное нами на этом корабле, не было таким... совершенным. Я вспоминаю свои лучшие рейды... и память о них, кажется, меркнет в сравнении с тем, что происходит, когда мы делим это упоение друг с другом".

I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

languages.text: “太棒了……”{n}玛拉斋的声音流露出一丝异样，不同于往常那种兴奋的战栗，而是一种难以言喻的强烈满足。他以宁静、陶醉的眼神凝视着你。{/n}“我们之前在这艘飞船上享受过的一切盛宴，都比不上今天这场……如此完美。即便是我过去最愉悦的杀戮经历，在我们所共赴的这场极乐体验面前，都黯然失色。”
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了……”{n}玛拉斋的声音流露出一丝异样，不同于往常那种兴奋的战栗，而是一种难以言喻的强烈满足。他以宁静、陶醉的眼神凝视着你。{/n}“我们之前在这艘飞船上享受过的一切盛宴，都比不上今天这场……如此完美。即便是我过去最愉悦的杀戮经历，在我们所共赴的这场极乐体验面前，都黯然失色。”

languages.text: «Magnífico...». {n}Captas algo nuevo en la voz de Marazhai, algo distinto a su habitual trepidación: es una satisfacción absoluta y sobrecogedora. Te mira con expresión serena y arrobada.{/n} «Ningún otro festín de cuantos hemos tenido en esta nave ha sido tan... perfecto. Pienso en mis mejores incursiones... y su recuerdo palidece en comparación con lo que sucede cuando compartimos este éxtasis juntos».
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

traits.locale_text: «Magnífico...». {n}Captas algo nuevo en la voz de Marazhai, algo distinto a su habitual trepidación: es una satisfacción absoluta y sobrecogedora. Te mira con expresión serena y arrobada.{/n} «Ningún otro festín de cuantos hemos tenido en esta nave ha sido tan... perfecto. Pienso en mis mejores incursiones... y su recuerdo palidece en comparación con lo que sucede cuando compartimos este éxtasis juntos».

languages.text: « Magnifique... » {n}Vous percevez quelque chose d'inédit dans sa voix, qui ne vibre pas de son excitation habituelle... l'intonation évoque un contentement extatique. Il vous couve d'un regard ravi et serein.{/n} « Aucun des festins que nous avons partagés sur ce vaisseau n'avait été aussi... parfait. Je repense à mes plus grands raids... et leur souvenir est bien terne par rapport à l'extase que nous ressentons quand nous festoyons côte à côte. »
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

traits.locale_text: « Magnifique... » {n}Vous percevez quelque chose d'inédit dans sa voix, qui ne vibre pas de son excitation habituelle... l'intonation évoque un contentement extatique. Il vous couve d'un regard ravi et serein.{/n} « Aucun des festins que nous avons partagés sur ce vaisseau n'avait été aussi... parfait. Je repense à mes plus grands raids... et leur souvenir est bien terne par rapport à l'extase que nous ressentons quand nous festoyons côte à côte. »

languages.text: "Herrlich ..." {n}In Marazhais Stimme erklingt etwas Neues, etwas anderes als seine üblich vibrierende Aufregung – vollständige und überwältigende Zufriedenheit. Er sieht dich ruhig und völlig verzückt an.{/n} "Kein Fest, das wir bisher auf dem Schiff erlebt haben, war auch nur annähernd so ... perfekt. Wenn ich auf meine besten Raubzüge zurückblicke ... verblasst ihre Erinnerung im Vergleich zur Ekstase, die wir miteinander teilen."
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

Wenn ich auf meine besten Raubzüge zurückblicke ... verblasst ihre Erinnerung im Vergleich zur Ekstase, die wir miteinander teilen."

languages.text: 「素晴らしい…」{n}マラズハイの声音から、どことなく今までにないものが感じられた。これまでの震えるような興奮とは異なる、完全な、圧倒的な満足感が伝わってくる。彼は穏やかながらも歓びに満ちた目であなたを見ている。{/n}「この船で味わったどんな饗宴も、これほどに…完璧なものはなかった。最高の襲撃を思い起こそうとも…その記憶は、この恍惚をわかち合うものに比べればささやかなものだ」
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

languages.text: "Olağanüstü..." {n}Marazhai'ın her zamanki heyecan içinde titreyen sesine hiç duymadığın bir ton hâkim. Baştan aşağı yoğun bir memnuniyet duyuyorsun. Gözlerinde huzurlu bir coşkuyla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu gemide yaptığımız hiçbir ziyafet, bunun kadar... Mükemmel olmamıştı. En iyi baskınlarımı düşünüp duruyorum ve... Onların hatıraları bile birbirimizle bu zevki paylaştığımızda vuku bulana kıyasla sönük kalıyor."
languages.original_text: "Magnificent..." {n}There is something new in Marazhai's voice, something other than his usual vibrating excitement — it is total, overwhelming contentment. He looks at you with serene rapture in his eyes.{/n} "No feast we have had on this ship has ever been so... perfect. I think back to my best raids... and the memory of them pales in comparison to what transpires when we share this ecstasy with each other."

Onların hatıraları bile birbirimizle bu zevki paylaştığımızda vuku bulanlara kıyasla sönük kalıyor."
